mapper.update: UPDATE EUSER SET EUSER_NAME = #{EUser_name}, EUSER_COMPANYNAME=#{EUser_companyname}, EUSER_DEPARTMENT=#{EUser_department}, EUSER_HOLD=#{EUser_hold}, EUSER_SEX=#{EUser_sex}, EUSER_REMARK=#{EUser_remark}, EUSER_INDENTITYNUMBER=#{EUser_indentitynumber}, EUSER_PHONE=#{EUser_phone}, EUSER_UPDATER=#{EUser_updater}, EUSER_UPDATETIME=#{EUser_updatetime} WHERE EUSER_ID = #{EUser_id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EUSER T WHERE T.EUSER_ISDELETE = '0' and T.EUser_creater = #{user_id}

select * from EUser e where e.EUSER_ISDELETE = '0' and e.EUSER_INDENTITYNUMBER = #{EUser_indentitynumber}
and e.EUSER_ID <> #{EUser_id}
select * from EUSER e where e.EUSER_ISDELETE = '0' and e.EUSER_ID = #{Euser_id}
select * from EUSER A where A.EUSER_CREATER = #{creater} and A.EUSER_ISDELETE = '0'
select *ã€€from EUSER e where e.EUSER_ISDELETE = '0' and e.EUser_creater = #{User_id}
